text:
="preserve">Kumkum (born Zaibunnissa; 22 April 1934 – 28 July 2020) was an Indian actress. She was born in Hussainabad, Sheikhpura district, Bihar. From 1954 to 1973, she appeared in 115 movies. Her best known roles were in "Ganga Maiyya Tohe Piyari Chadhaibo", "Mr. X in Bombay" and "Gunah Aur Kanoon".
Kumkum died on 28 July 2020 at the age of 86.
